home.avatarAlt: Avatar in anime style of Flo Wolfe
home.description: I'm a seasoned software engineer with a passion for all things tech. I have a loads of interests but at the top of the list you'll find a love for electronic music, 3D printing, manga, speedrunning, and gaming.
home.pride: As a proud transfeminine non-binary person, I embrace my journey and love connecting with others in the 2SLGBTQIA+ community.
home.location: I live and work in Tiohtià:ke/Montréal, the traditional territory of the Kanien’kehá:ka Nation.
